column2:
"...And so I'd like you all to be ready
for the Starless at a moment's notice."

"While we're conducting a re-examination of Halpha,
we'll strengthen coordination between regions."
"Good luck, everyone."
"Phew... That was a long meeting. Thanks for your attendance."
"Ummm, so... Can I ask something?"
"Hm? What is it?"
"Shouldn't you have also invited Manon to this meeting, or...?"
"As for Manon... well, you see..."
"She's currently with the Resurgent ARKS in our custody..."
"...under house arrest at an undisclosed location."
"What are you going to do to Manon?"
"You're going to punish her?"

"She hasn't done anything wrong, no.
She just shouldn't be in public right now."
"What do you mean?"

"The Resurgent ARKS are in a situation
that everyone sympathizes with."
"Not least of all us, who actually know the details."

"From the day they were created, they've had to
manage all of Halpha, like cogs in a grand machine."
"Without ever being taught right from wrong..."

"However, there are some people who harbor
animosity towards the Resurgent ARKS."
"...And it's understandable that some people can't forgive them."

"Right now, Manon, Faria, and others are
being questioned about their circumstances."

"Asking them about what happened,
and what they did, and so on... "

"Their testimony will be heard by the people,
who will then be asked for their understanding."

"It will take some time for the people to
find acceptance and for things to calm down."
"How much time, though?"

"It shouldn't take too long. When the time comes,
you two will be the first to know."
"...A-Alright... I'll take your word for it and wait, then..."
"Thank you. Does that sound alright with you?"
"You won't treat her like an enemy?"
"Nothing bad will happen to her?"
"Perish the thought."
"What is it?"

"Well, I don't want Manon to end up
eating the same food all the time, so..."

"Um... Can you make sure she's
at least being given tasty food?"

"Aye, understood. I'll tell her case worker.
Anything else?"
"No... That's all."
"...Alright. Now, let's start talking about what lies ahead for the both of you."

"We'll help with anything we can,
just tell us what you need! Right?"
"I appreciate it."

"...Phew. But this has dragged on for
a while now, so let's take a brief recess."

"Our next discussion will be a
very important one for the both of you."

"You might want to get
your affairs in order beforehand."
